main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) over Sewart Air Force Base in Tennessee in September 1958.
interesting points: The UFOs were observed hovering and moving erratically, displaying controlled maneuvers and rapid darting at various speeds.
Witnesses included members of the Aircraft Control and Warning Squadron and Headquarters and Headquarters Squadron at Sewart Air Force Base.
Radar operators confirmed the visual sightings, and radar scope photographs of the objects were obtained.
The size of the UFOs was estimated to be approximately that of a medium aircraft, with translucent and opaque characteristics, and speeds exceeding 600 miles per hour.
The UFOs displayed movements described as being like 'a ball bouncing on the ground,' and their color varied from bright orange to amber or yellow-white.
witnesses: members of the Aircraft Control and Warning Squadron and Headquarters and Headquarters Squadron
photographs: yes, radar scope photographs of the objects were obtained
